name: Learningcolors
0:
”Alexa, start learning colors”
”Alexa, start learning colors and play on screen”
”Alexa, start learning colors and play without buttons”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learning colors
des:
Learn the colors in a playful way with the help of Alexa.

As a prerequisite to play you need at least two echo buttons OR an Alexa device with display.
Before the game starts the echo buttons need to be registered for the game by clicking on it. Difficulty increases with the number of registered buttons. The game principle is easy. Alexa asks for a color and shows the registered buttons or the virtual buttons on the screen in different colors where only one is the correct one.

The following In-Skill products are available for purchase to extend the game with additional colors:

- Color Package 1: violet, orange, white, turquoise
- Color Package 2: pink, lime, gold, lavender, coral

The game continues to run until it is stopped with the voice command "Alexa, stop".

Note:
========
Echo Buttons are not supported on FireTV Stick. The colors are chosen directly on the screen with the help of the remote control.


If there are any problems, crashes or questions send a feedback to the developer!


Available voice commands:
==============================================

* Alexa, start learning colors
* Alexa, start learning colors and play on screen
* Alexa, start learning colors and play without buttons
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
